text: Oleyres was a municipality in the Swiss canton of Vaud in the district of Broye-Vully. On 1 July 2011, became part of the municipality of Avenches.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 17 February 2011 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Vaud Category:Villages in Vaud Category:2011 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Oleyres
